performance_metrics.name: Production Rate (Units/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: The number of standard loaves (approximately 450g) produced per hour. This value varies depending on bread type and production line efficiency.

performance_metrics.name: Yield Loss (%)
performance_metrics.description: The percentage of total dough input that is lost during the process due to waste, mis-shaped loaves, or damaged products. Aim for the lower end of the range through optimized processes.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of the internal texture of the bread. Target range depends on bread type, but generally reflects a desirable level of airiness and softness.

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: The amount of water in the final product. This impacts shelf life and texture. Critical for shelf-stable breads.

performance_metrics.name: Crust Hardness (Shore A)
performance_metrics.description: A measurement of crust firmness, correlated with consumer preference. Influenced by baking temperature and crust formulation.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: The time the bread remains acceptable for sale, considering factors like moisture control and packaging.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Preparation System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated mixing and dough fermentation system capable of handling 500 - 1000 kg batches. Fermentation temperature control between 28°C - 32°C. Dough hydration level 60% - 70%.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures consistent dough quality and fermentation rates.

implementation_requirements.name: Shaping Machine
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated shaping machine with conveyor belt system. Shaping capacity: 1200 - 2400 loaves/hour. Mold size: 450g loaves. Precision tolerances: +/- 2mm.
implementation_requirements.description: Consistent loaf formation is vital for throughput and product appearance.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature control: 30°C - 35°C. Humidity control: 70% - 80%. Conveyor belt system for automated loaf transfer.
implementation_requirements.description: Maintains optimal conditions for final dough rise.

implementation_requirements.name: Baking Conveyor
implementation_requirements.specifications: Multi-zone baking conveyor with precise temperature control (230°C - 260°C). Conveyor belt speed: Adjustable, optimized for baking time.  Zone temperature control range: 220°C - 260°C.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures uniform baking and crust development.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Rapid cooling system using forced air circulation. Temperature: 15°C - 25°C. Cooling time: 5 - 10 minutes.
implementation_requirements.description: Prevents over-browning and maintains product quality.

implementation_requirements.name: Packaging System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated bagging machine with nitrogen flushing (1-2 ppm) for extended shelf life. Bag material: Multi-layer polypropylene with aluminum foil liner.
implementation_requirements.description: Maintains freshness and prevents mold growth.
